print_obj[source]

print_obj(obj, depth=1, indent=' ', width=100, seq_length=1000, show_protected=False, show_private=True, show_static=True, show_properties=True, show_address=False, str_length=1000)

Print everything that belongs to an object

from fastai2.vision.all import *

path=untar_data(URLs.PETS)/'images'
def is_cat(x): return x[0].isupper()
dls = ImageDataLoaders.from_name_func(
      path, get_image_files(path), valid_pct=0.2, seed=42,
      label_func=is_cat, item_tfms=Resize(224))
print_obj(dls)

print_obj(dls.vocab,3)

fastai2.data.transforms.CategoryMap(
  items = fastcore.foundation.L(items = [False, True]), 
  o2i = {False: 0, True: 1}
)

learn=cnn_learner(dls, resnet34, metrics=error_rate)

print_obj(learn)
